items.sentence: You can be pretty charming when you want to be.
You can see the sun peeking through the clouds.
Tom thought that no one knew what he was doing.
Mary is wearing the dress she bought yesterday.
Mary played the tin whistle when she was young.
Mary said Tom wanted her to eat lunch with him.
Mary told Tom about what John wanted her to do.
You look as though nothing has happened to you.
Come over here and warm yourselves by the fire.
Tom married Mary without her parents\' consent.
Tom had completely forgotten that he was naked.
Tom had enough time to do what he needed to do.
Do you agree with what Tom wrote in his report?
Let\'s hope Tom will have the sense to do that.
Tom, I want you to know that you\'re not alone.
Tom only earns half as much money as Mary does.
Tom persuaded Mary to go to the party with him.
Tom put all his belongings in a small suitcase.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was studying French.
Tom didn\'t know whether Mary liked him or not.
